query: SELECT DATE(updatedAt) as d, processingStatus, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM documents WHERE processingStatus IN ('completed', 'failed', 'discarded') AND updatedAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(updatedAt), processingStatus ORDER BY d DESC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Toxohk3Dhi9dsc.27440a48dc26 --database n8MPugiTXDQnrheaaMVyV7 --execute SELECT DATE(updatedAt) as d, processingStatus, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM documents WHERE processingStatus IN ('completed', 'failed', 'discarded') AND updatedAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(updatedAt), processingStatus ORDER BY d DESC LIMIT 20;
